bankmanager

Class TransactionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • bankmanager.TransactionManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    class TransactionManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Transaction Manager handles all requests related to Transaction as delegated by the BankManager.

      TransactionManager()

    • Method Detail

      • undoTransaction

        public void undoTransaction(User usr,
                            Account acct)
        Used to undo any type of transaction except Deposits because deposits cannot be reversed.
        Parameters:
        usr - the user that owns the account
        acct - the account used to perform the transaction being reversed

      • undoWithdraw

        private void undoWithdraw(Account acct)
        Used to undo transactions of type Withdrawal.
        Parameters:
        acct - the account from which money was withdrawn

      • undoTransferIn

        private void undoTransferIn(User usr,
                            Account acct)
        Used to undo transactions of type Transfer In.
        Parameters:
        usr - the user who transferred the money
        acct - the account the money was transferred into

      • undoTransferOut

        private void undoTransferOut(User usr,
                             Account acct)
        Used to undor transactions of type Transfer Out.
        Parameters:
        usr - the user who transferred the money
        acct - the account the money was transferred out of

      • undoPayBill

        private void undoPayBill(Account acct)
        Used to undo transactions of type Pay Bill.
        Parameters:
        acct - the account used to pay a bill from

      • removeLastTransactionFromList

        private void removeLastTransactionFromList(Account account)
        Deletes the last Transaction from the account's list of transactions
        Parameters:
        account - the account the transaction is being removed from

      • writeObject

        private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Used in serialization to store the Transaction Manager object.
        Parameters:
        oos - instance of the ObjectOutputStream class to write the transaction manager object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs.

      • readObject

        private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream ois)
                 throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Used in serialization to restore the Transcation Manager's information after the ATM is restarted.
        Parameters:
        ois - instance of the ObjectInputStream class used to read the transaction manager object
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class of the serialized object could not be found
        java.io.IOException - if an IO error occurs

      • readObjectNoData

        private void readObjectNoData()
                       throws java.io.ObjectStreamException
        Used in serialization when class inheritance is not as expected
        Throws:
        java.io.ObjectStreamException - when an attempt to deserialize a back-reference fails
